segments.text: Ms . Montgomery ? Do you have a moment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , Brian . What ’ s on your mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m a bit upset about this year ’ s bonus . I was really expecting a little more . Are there any problems with my work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not at all , Brian . This year , we ’ Ve all had to cut back . I ’ m hoping next year ’ s going to better . I hope you can understand .
segments.speaker: S2
